Package weka.classifiers.mllib

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MLlibClassifier
    Abstract base class for Weka MLlib wrapper classifiers.
    MLlibDecisionTree
    Weka classifier wrapper for the MLlib DecisionTree classifier
    MLlibGradientBoostedTrees
    Weka wrapper classifier for MLlib gradient boosted trees
    MLlibLinearRegressionSGD
    Weka wrapper classifier for the MLlib linear regression scheme
    MLlibLogistic
    Weka wrapper classifier for the MLlib logistic regression scheme
    MLlibNaiveBayes
    Weka wrapper classifier for the MLlib naive bayes scheme
    MLlibRandomForest
    Weka classifier wrapper for the MLlib Random Forest classifier
    MLlibSparkContextManager
    Helper class for maintaining a singleton Spark context.
    MLlibSVM
    Weka wrapper for the MLlib SVM classifier
    WekaClassifierSparkJobWrapper
    Wraps the WekaClassifierSpark job in a Weka classifier instance, so that it can be applied to standard datasets loaded into Weka on a desktop machine.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MLlibDecisionTree.Impurity
    Enum for impurity settings
    MLlibLinearRegressionSGD.Regularization  
    MLlibNaiveBayes.ModelType
    Enum for the type of NB model
    MLlibSVM.Penalty
    Enum for the penalty type
